attributes.action: stop mass imigration into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for the government to wake up and stop the mass immigration into this once great country, how many times do we the people of Great Briton have to shout at the top of their voices that we have had ENOUGH OF IMIGRATION.
 This island is full, we have no room on our roads we have no room in our schools or hospitals and our jails are full.
So Mr Brown stand up for your people or the people will not stand up for you when YOU need us most

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
